name: Lung Texture Aggregate Assessment
description: Characterization of lung parenchyma by location and texture

attributes.name: Volume
attributes.description: Volume of the reference lung region

attributes.description: Proportion of the lung region which is hyperlucent

attributes.description: Proportion of the lung region which is ground glass

attributes.name: Pulmonary vessel volume
attributes.description: Measurement of the amount of blood in the pulmonary arteries and veins
